property.name: objectDescription
property.value:

property.name: summary
property.value: Narrative description of the CLU, used for the catalog.

property.name: description
property.value: Narrative description of the CLU, used for the catalog.

property.name: objectDescription
property.value: Narrative description of the CLU, used for the catalog.

property.name: summary
property.value: Information related to the official identification of the clu, typically in human readable form.

property.name: description
property.value: Information related to the official identification of the clu, typically in human readable form. Used to officially reference or publish.

property.name: objectDescription
property.value: Information related to the official identification of the clu, typically in human readable form. Used to officially reference or publish.

property.name: summary
property.value: The composite string that is used to officially reference or publish the CLU.

property.name: description
property.value: The composite string that is used to officially reference or publish the CLU. Note it may have an internal structure that each Institution may want to enforce. This structure may be composed from the other parts of the structure such as Level amp; Division, but may include items such as cluType.

property.name: summary
property.value: Abbreviated name of the CLU, commonly used on transcripts

property.name: description
property.value: Abbreviated name of the CLU, commonly used on transcripts

property.name: summary
property.value: A code that indicates whether this is introductory, advanced, etc.

property.name: description
property.value: A code that indicates whether this is introductory, advanced, etc.

property.name: summary
property.value: A code that indicates what school, program, major, subject area, etc.

property.name: description
property.value: A code that indicates what school, program, major, subject area, etc. Examples: "Chem", "18"

property.name: summary
property.value: A number that indicates the sequence or order of versions in cases where several different Clus have the same offical Identifier

property.name: description
property.value: A number that indicates the sequence or order of versions in cases where several different Clus have the same offical Identifier

property.name: summary
property.value: Create and last update info for the structure.

property.name: description
property.value:
Create and last update info for the structure. This is optional and treated as read only since the data is set by the internals of the service during maintenance operations.
Contains audit trail information about the creation and last update of this object Also contains the version ind used for optimistic locking.
Attempts to set or update should result in a ReadOnlyException being thrown.

property.name: objectDescription
property.value:
Create and last update info for the structure. This is optional and treated as read only since the data is set by the internals of the service during maintenance operations.
Contains audit trail information about the creation and last update of this object Also contains the version ind used for optimistic locking.
Attempts to set or update should result in a ReadOnlyException being thrown.

property.name: summary
property.value: Information related to alternate identifications of the clu, typically in human readable form.

property.name: description
property.value: Information related to alternate identifications of the clu, typically in human readable form. Used to reference or publish.

property.name: summary
property.value: The Study Subject Area is used to identify the area of study associated with the clu.

property.name: description
property.value: The Study Subject Area is used to identify the area of study associated with the clu. It may be a general study area (e.g. Chemistry) or very specific (e.g. Naval Architecture) depending on the level of specificity of the clu.

property.name: summary
property.value: Places where this clu might be offered

property.name: description
property.value: Places where this clu might be offered

property.name: summary
property.value: Information around the accreditation of the clu.

property.name: description
property.value: Information around the accreditation of the clu.

property.name: summary
property.value: Admin Orgs associated with this clu

property.name: description
property.value: Admin Orgs associated with this clu

property.name: summary
property.value: Primary potential instructor for the clu.

property.name: description
property.value: Primary potential instructor for the clu. This is primarily for use in advertising the clu and may not be the actual instructor.

property.name: objectDescription
property.value: Primary potential instructor for the clu. This is primarily for use in advertising the clu and may not be the actual instructor.

property.name: description
property.value: Unique identifier for an organization. This indicates which organization this individual is associated with for the purposes of this clu.

property.name: summary
property.value: Unique identifier for a person record.

property.name: description
property.value: Unique identifier for a person record.

property.name: summary
property.value: Any override information for the person

property.name: description
property.value: Any override information for the person

property.name: description
property.value: Instructors associated with this clu. This may not be an exhaustive list, and instead may only be used to indicate potential instructors in publication.

property.name: summary
property.value: The expected first academic time period that this clu would be effective.

property.name: description
property.value: The expected first academic time period that this clu would be effective. This may not reflect the first "real" academic time period for this clu.

property.name: summary
property.value: The last academic time period that this clu would be effective.

property.name: description
property.value: The last academic time period that this clu would be effective.

property.name: summary
property.value: The last academic time period that this clu would be available for enrollment.

property.name: description
property.value: The last academic time period that this clu would be available for enrollment. This may not reflect the last "real" academic time period for this clu.

property.name: summary
property.value: The kind of units associated with the quantity, such as hours/week.

property.name: description
property.value: The kind of units associated with the quantity, such as hours/week. It is expected that in usage in other structures, this value will always be enumerated based on that context. Key

property.name: description
property.value: The amount of units. Allowed values consist of numeric values as well as the string "unbounded".

property.name: summary
property.value: The standard duration of the learning unit.

property.name: description
property.value: The standard duration of the learning unit.

property.name: objectDescription
property.value: The standard duration of the learning unit.

property.name: summary
property.value: The kind of units associated with the quantity, such as Semesters.

property.name: label
property.value: Academic Time Period Duration Type Key

property.name: description
property.value: The kind of units associated with the quantity, such as Semesters.

property.name: summary
property.value: Indicates if the CLU can be used to instantiate LUIs (offerings).

property.name: description
property.value: Indicates if the CLU can be used to instantiate LUIs (offerings).

property.name: summary
property.value: An URL for additional information about the CLU.

property.name: description
property.value: An URL for additional information about the CLU. This could be a reference to a document which might in turn have references to other documents (e.g. course syllabus provided by the faculty or department, standard schedule of classes, etc.).

property.name: summary
property.value: List of LU code info structures.

property.name: description
property.value: List of LU code info structures. These are structures so that many different types of codes can be associated with the clu. This allows them to be put into categories.

property.name: summary
property.value: When the next review should be

property.name: description
property.value: When the next review should be

property.name: summary
property.value: Indicates if Luis generated from this Clu are intended to be enrolled in by Students directly

property.name: description
property.value: Indicates if Luis generated from this Clu are intended to be enrolled in by Students directly

property.name: summary
property.value: The academic time period types in which this CLU is typically offered.

property.name: description
property.value: The academic time period types in which this CLU is typically offered. Standard usage would equate to terms.

property.name: summary
property.value: Indicates if the CLU has an Early Drop Deadline (EDD).

property.name: description
property.value: Indicates if the CLU has an Early Drop Deadline (EDD). Certain courses are designated as such to maximize access to courses that have historically experienced high demand and high attrition. Default is "false".

property.name: summary
property.value: Default enrollment estimate for this CLU.

property.name: description
property.value: Default enrollment estimate for this CLU.

property.name: summary
property.value: Default maximum enrollment for this CLU.

property.name: description
property.value: Default maximum enrollment for this CLU.

property.name: summary
property.value: Indicates if the CLU may be hazardous for students with disabilities.

property.name: description
property.value: Indicates if the CLU may be hazardous for students with disabilities. Would default to "false".

property.name: summary
property.value: Fee information associated with this CLU.

property.name: description
property.value: Fee information associated with this CLU.

property.name: objectDescription
property.value: Fee information associated with this CLU.

property.name: summary
property.value: Narrative description of the CLU Fee

property.name: description
property.value: Narrative description of the CLU Fee

property.name: objectDescription
property.value: Narrative description of the CLU Fee

property.value: The date and time this version became current.

property.value: The date and time when this version stopped being current.

property.value: Version from which this version was created
